Select Beer - None - Sapporo Premium Beer Sapporo Premium Black Beer Sapporo Premium Light Beer Sapporo Reserve Beer Package Type - None - Can Bottle Keg Packaged on Date Packaged Time Brewery Location How to find the packaged on date, packaged time, brewery location Describe the Issue Store Name Store Location Purchase Date How did you store the beer? - None - Refrigerated Room Temperature Warm Upload a photo of the issue Upload a photo (Optional) One file only. 10 MB limit. Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, png. If you live outside of the USA and Canada, please visit Sapporo Breweries (Japan) at: https://www.sapporobeer.jp/english/inquire/ If you live in Canada, please contact Sapporo Canada at: info@sapporobeer.ca . ARE YOU THE LEGAL DRINKING AGE You must be of legal drinking age to enter this site By clicking ENTER, you represent that you are at least 21 years of age and are accessing this website from a jurisdiction where the consumption of alcohol is legal. Sapporo USA asks those who may consume alcoholic beverages legally to do so responsibly. By submitting this form, you agree to the privacy and cookie policy of this website. This website will make use of cookies. To learn more, please read our privacy policy and cookie policy . Dive into thrilling tales of intrigue and suspense with our Murder Book Club, meeting on the 3rd Wednesday of each month at Avalon General inside The Marketplace. Grab a glass of wine, meet fellow book enthusiasts, and unravel twisted plots together. Upcoming Meetings: September 17, 6:30 PM: The Poet by Michael Connelly Mayhem, Adventure, Intrigue!
